context: Do you have any movies to recommend from the director, Greg Mottola?
Of course! Greg Mattola directed both Superbad and Paul. Did you know he also starred in Celebrity?
I did not know that and I wonder, did Evan Goldberg participate in writing Superbad?
resp: Yes! Evan Goldberg is listed as a writer on Superbad. He also wrote This is the End.

context.content: "Saw" is a psychological horror film directed by James Wan. The plot revolves around two men who wake up in a dilapidated bathroom, chained at opposite ends of the room, and are given instructions to escape before time runs out. The film features intense drama and suspense as the characters are forced to confront their darkest secrets and make life-or-death decisions. It's a gripping and intense thriller that keeps you on the edge of your seat.
